author: Ever Gao
description: Ever’s inspiration: “The Fire Thief is inspired by Prometheus in Greek mythology, who defied the gods, stole fire for humanity, and ensured our progress. Fire thus represents hope for humankind – it is our driving force, gives us strength when we’re down and gives meaning to what we do. One year ago, I was also looking for hope in my confusion. I began questioning my suitability and ability as a bartender; then BACARDÍ Legacy found me. My journey thus far has brought me renewed hope, a support platform with my peers, a stage to show off my Fire Thief - my hope, my legacy…”
name: The Fire Thief

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
